title: Looking for high silver to low gold players with potential.
body:
Hey dudes im just trying to find more people for my club. Were about 10 or so strong but im always looking for more. Friend and msg me for invite

My name: crocodilia
Team Name: xXIlluminationXx
Rank were looking for: high silver to low gold.

replies.body:
Add me: Galacticamaru, Gold 5

I play:  Top, jungle and ADC.

Sup Main, not a smurf but add me if you at least want to try out a couple games. Always willing to learn as well.

na.op.gg/summoner/userName=9tt2
